review: The product description claims the fire stick is portable so you can use it in TVs all over your home. However, they fail to inform the consumer it is recommended that the fire stick be within 10 feet or LESS of the Wifi router. I didn't find this out until calling customer service because we were unable to get a decent connection for more than a few seconds on our family room TV (25 feet from the Wifi router). The product works ok on our TV next to the Wifi, otherwise it is useless.
author: Stephanie E. Dobrowolski "Bridge Over the River Kwai"
